title: Tudor Style Dream Home with Views
posting_body: To schedule an Appointment online, please visit: <URL>
To see more pics, please visit: <URL>
You will love this home and neighborhood!
There are 4 Bedrooms and 3 Bathrooms in a traditional Tudor-styled two-level (unfurnished).
Woodhill Estates is a highly sought-after, well-established community with large, high-value homes.
There is one bedroom on the first floor and three on the 2nd floor, which includes a generously sized primary suite with a fabulous bath tube, sizable shower, and large walk-in closet.
The living room has a gas fireplace and brand new carpet, and the family room features a wet bar and an additional gas fireplace.
Have your family and friends enjoy food and conversation in the eat-in kitchen or dine formally in the dining room or in the sun on the huge deck area outdoors.
The backyard has many trees and views to the North like no other!
Other fine features include gleaming hardwood floors, a recently refurbished kitchen as well as parking in the attached two-car garage.
LOCATION
The house is well-located near Redwood City amenities, such as Caltrain Station (2 Miles), Downtown shopping & restaurants (2 Miles), and Red Morton Community Park (1.5 Miles).
Redwood City is centrally situated on the San Francisco Peninsula, approx.
27 miles south of San Francisco, 7 miles north of Stanford University.
SCHOOLS (Public - Please Verify Availability):
Redwood City School District - Roy Cloud Elementary & John F. Kennedy Middle School
Sequoia Union High School District - Woodside High School
TERMS & DISCLOSURES
Ready to move in Immediately
Renter's Insurance Required naming Owner as "Additionally Insured"
Forced Air Gas Powered Heater
No Smoking / No Vaping
Pets Apply Policy - See Pet Application
Tenant responsible for All Utilities: Electric & Gas, Garbage & Water.
Landscape Maintenance Included
The fireplace is for decorative purposes only
Application Fee = $50 per adult
Security Deposit is equal to one and a half month's rent (Subject to excellent credit)
Born Property Management CA License: 02002900
Prices, terms, offers, and availability are all subject to change without notice.
See Sales Representative for details.
All information deemed reliable but not guaranteed or warranted and should be independently verified
